member.name: CustomLineCap.Clone
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.Clone method copies the contents of the existing object into a new CustomLineCap object.
member.returns: This method returns a pointer to the new CustomLineCap object.

member.name: CustomLineCap.CustomLineCap
member.param: The object to copy into this object.

member.name: CustomLineCap.CustomLineCap
member.param: Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the line cap that will be used. The default value is LineCapFlat.

member.name: CustomLineCap.CustomLineCap
member.param: Optional. Element of the enumeration that specifies the line cap that will be used. The default value is LineCapFlat.

member.name: CustomLineCap.GetBaseCap
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.GetBaseCap method gets the style of the base cap. The base cap is a object used as a cap at the end of a line along with this CustomLineCap object.
member.returns: This method returns the value of the line cap used at the base of the line.

member.name: CustomLineCap.GetBaseInset
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.GetBaseInset method gets the distance between the base cap to the start of the line.
member.returns: This method returns the base inset value.

member.name: CustomLineCap.GetLastStatus
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.GetLastStatus method returns a value that indicates the nature of this CustomLineCap object's most recent method failure.

returns.para: The CustomLineCap.GetLastStatus method returns an element of the enumeration.
If no methods invoked on this CustomLineCap object have failed since the previous call to CustomLineCap.GetLastStatus, then CustomLineCap.GetLastStatus returns Ok.

If at least one method invoked on this CustomLineCap object has failed since the previous call to CustomLineCap.GetLastStatus, then CustomLineCap.GetLastStatus returns a value that indicates the nature of the most recent failure.

member.name: CustomLineCap.GetStrokeCaps
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.GetStrokeCaps method gets the end cap styles for both the start line cap and the end line cap. Line caps are objects that end the individual lines within a path.
member.param: Pointer to a variable that receives an element of the enumeration that indicates the line cap used at the start of the line to be drawn.
Pointer to a variable that receives an element of the enumeration that indicates the line cap used at the end of the line to be drawn.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: CustomLineCap.GetStrokeJoin
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.GetStrokeJoin method returns the style of used to join multiple lines in the same GraphicsPath object.
member.returns: This method returns the style of line join.

member.name: CustomLineCap.GetWidthScale
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.GetWidthScale method gets the value of the scale width. This is the amount to scale the custom line cap relative to the width of thePen object used to draw a line. The default value of 1.0 does not scale the line cap.
member.returns: This method returns the value of the width-scaling factor. It is of typeREAL.

member.name: CustomLineCap.SetBaseCap
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.SetBaseCap method sets the that appears as part of this CustomLineCap at the end of a line.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the line cap used on the ends of the line to be drawn.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: CustomLineCap.SetBaseInset
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.SetBaseInset method sets the base inset value of this custom line cap. This is the distance between the end of a line and the base cap.
member.param: Real number that specifies the distance, in units, from the base cap to the start of the line. If this value is greater than the length of the line, the behavior of this method is undefined.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: CustomLineCap.SetStrokeCap
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.SetStrokeCap method sets the object used to start and end lines within the GraphicsPath object that defines this CustomLineCap object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the line cap that will be used on the ends of the line to be drawn.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: CustomLineCap.SetStrokeCaps
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.SetStrokeCaps method sets the objects used to start and end lines within the GraphicsPath object that defines this CustomLineCap object.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the line cap that will be used for the start of the line to be drawn.
Element of the enumeration that specifies the line cap that will be used for the end of the line to be drawn.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: CustomLineCap.SetStrokeJoin
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.SetStrokeJoin method sets the style of line join for the stroke. The line join specifies how two lines that intersect within the GraphicsPath object that makes up the custom line cap are joined.
member.param: Element of the enumeration that specifies the line join that will be used for two lines that are drawn by the same pen and that have overlapping ends.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.

member.name: CustomLineCap.SetWidthScale
member.summary: The CustomLineCap.SetWidthScale method sets the value of the scale width. This is the amount to scale the custom line cap relative to the width of the Pen used to draw lines. The default value of 1.0 does not scale the line cap.
member.param: Real number that specifies the scaling factor that will be used to scale the line width.

returns.para: If the method succeeds, it returns Ok, which is an element of the enumeration.
If the method fails, it returns one of the other elements of the enumeration.
